The 'Rule of 40' is typically calculated by combining the growth rate + operating margin to showcase a profitability adjusted growth metric.

Here‚Äôs the updated software comp sheet after the SaaSpocalypse 2026:

Rule of 40 scores
‚Ä¢ Unicorn (60%+) | $PLTR
‚Ä¢ Elite (50-59%) | $NOW, $CRWD, $PANW, $ADBE, $SNOW, $ZS
‚Ä¢ Great (40-49%) | $TEAM, $DDOG, $MNDY, $CRM, $SHOP, $NET, $GTLB
‚Ä¢ Good (30-39%) | $RBRK, $FIG, $HUBS, $MDB, $IOT, $PATH

Whenever we hit a platform shift like AI, application software gets thrown into the ‚Äútoo hard‚Äù bucket because FCF feels harder to model.

That‚Äôs how you end up with an indiscriminate reset across the entire software space. 

I‚Äôve been adding a ton of AI security this past week.

$NVDA CEO Jensen Huang just said ‚ÄúNobody uses AI as well as $META.‚Äù

Meta just showed AI-driven ad ranking drove ~4x more revenue impact than increasing ad load with both price per ad & impressions accelerating.

This is what AI monetization actually looks like.

FDA signals crackdown on non-approved compounded GLP-1s explicitly naming $HIMS.

Agency says it will use full enforcement powers including seizures and injunctions against companies marketing unapproved GLP-1 products.

Jensen Huang‚Äôs interview had a few important tells.

The $NVDA GPU depreciation overhang on AI utilities like $NBIS, $IREN, $CIFR & $CRWV is fading right as hyperscaler CapEx + GPU demand re-accelerate.

This is still early innings of the largest industrial buildout of our time.

$GOOGL YouTube is the most popular app in the U.S. across every age group.

That‚Äôs what it looks like when you own the consumer internet.
Polymarket nearly overtook $HOOD in site visits in January  üëÄ

$NVDA CEO says GPUs sold six years ago are rising in price and that it could take seven years to fully size true AI demand.

This is incredibly bullish for AI Utility layer like $NBIS, $IREN and $CIFR.
BITCOIN $BTC BACK ABOVE $70,000

$GOOGL Waymo just unveiled its ‚ÄúWaymo World Model‚Äù which is a large-scale, hyper-realistic simulator for autonomous driving.

It‚Äôs built on DeepMind‚Äôs Genie 3 and becomes another structural advantage inside their autonomy stack.

$NVDA has added over ~$300B in market cap today.

That move comes as $AMZN, $GOOGL, $META & $MSFT commit to over $620B in CapEx this year.

Since October of last year, the broader market appears to have entered a multi-month topping process. Bitcoin $BTC and high beta stocks peaked first, and that weakness has since broadened. 

The Magnificent 7 have also begun to diverge‚Äîsix of the seven are trending lower relative to the broader market. In the analysis below, Portfolio Manager @knox_ridley examines what these warning signals imply for investors in Q1 and beyond.

I have been engaged in capital markets for 40 years and I can assure you that this is not a normal functioning market‚Ä¶

üö® Software as a Shock: II

Anthropic dropped two product headlines in one week: ‚ÄúLegal‚Äù for contract workflows, then Opus 4.6 pitched for financial analysis and spreadsheets. 

Markets reacted first and sold the workflow stack.

Here is the kick: It‚Äôs tempting to say ‚ÄúAnthropic triggered it,‚Äù but the more accurate framing..is something else.

See below:

Yes.

How do you break the buy the dip mentality?

Exactly the way Silver did.

Crash it hard, rebound it hard, crash it hard again.

I think we see a similar sequence with stocks and crypto.
